items.name: init(mPanningMode: AudioPanningMode, mCoordinateFlags: UInt32, mCoordinates: (Float32, Float32, Float32), mGainScale: Float32, mOutputChannelMap: UnsafePointer<AudioChannelLayout>)
var mCoordinateFlags: UInt32
items.desc: For the available coordinate flags, see Channel Coordinate Flags.

items.name: var mCoordinates: (Float32, Float32, Float32)
items.desc: For the available coordinate index constants, see Channel Coordinate Index Constants.

items.name: var mGainScale: Float32
items.desc: A multiplier for audio panning values, typically representing a volume value in the range from 0 to 1. A value of 1 results in audio panning at unity gain. A value of 0 silences all channels.

items.name: var mOutputChannelMap: UnsafePointer<AudioChannelLayout>
items.desc: The channel map used to determine channel volumes for the audio panning.

items.name: var mPanningMode: AudioPanningMode
items.desc: The panning mode to be used for the pan. See AudioPanningMode.
